perturbation.original_text: "Calculation and Paying Agent" means The Bank of New York Mellon acting pursuant to the Tender and Paying Agent Agreement or any successor thereto.
perturbation.changed_text: "Calculation and Paying Agent" means The Bank of New York Mellon acting pursuant to the Tender and Paying Agent Contract or any successor thereto.
perturbation.explanation: The term "Tender and Paying Agent Agreement" is changed to "Tender and Paying Agent Contract" without a clear definition of whether these terms are interchangeable. This introduces uncertainty about which specific agreement is being referenced, especially if multiple documents exist.

perturbation.original_text: (a) The Remarketing Agent hereby represents, warrants and agrees that it has, and during the term of this Agreement shall maintain, all licenses, consents and other rights required for the use of any index or other data in connection with calculation of the Dividend Rate or dissemination thereof.
perturbation.changed_text: (a) The Remarketing Agent hereby represents, warrants and agrees that it has, and during the term of this Contract shall maintain, all licenses, consents and other rights required for the use of any index or other data in connection with calculation of the Dividend Rate or dissemination thereof.
perturbation.explanation: The term "Agreement" is changed to "Contract" without a clear definition of whether these terms are interchangeable. This introduces uncertainty and inconsistency.
perturbation.location: Section 3. Representations, Warranties and Covenants of the Remarketing Agent and the Fund

perturbation.original_text: A copy of the Declaration is on file with the Secretary of the Commonwealth of Massachusetts. This Agreement has been executed on behalf of the Fund by an officer of the Fund in such capacity and not individually and the obligations of the Fund under this Agreement are not binding upon such officer, any of the trustees or the shareholders individually but are binding only upon the assets and property of the Fund.
perturbation.changed_text: A copy of the Declaration is on file with the Secretary of the Commonwealth of Massachusetts. This Contract has been executed on behalf of the Fund by an officer of the Fund in such capacity and not individually and the obligations of the Fund under this Contract are not binding upon such officer, any of the trustees or the shareholders individually but are binding only upon the assets and property of the Fund.
perturbation.explanation: The term "Agreement" is changed to "Contract" without a clear definition of whether these terms are interchangeable. This introduces uncertainty and inconsistency.
perturbation.location: Section 25. Liability of Officers, Trustees and Shareholders
